title: Neural Network - Malware - [0.67]
description: Neural Network - Statistical Encoding - Microsoft MalwareThere aren't any examples of using a neural network to model Microsoft Malware, so I thought I'd post one. Also in this kernel, I show statistical one-hot-encoding where only boolean variables that are independently statistically significant are created. Load Train.csv
